name: 4096 Hexa
description:
* REVIEWS *

- “4096 Hexa” is still able to provide tremendous fun and keep a player occupied for a good amount of time. - playandroid.com

- 4096 Hexa game app is 2048 on steroids. - androidcommunity.com

- An excellent puzzle game that both fans and non-fans of 2048 should take to - androidheadlines.com

* HOW TO PLAY *

- Swipe by mouse, or press Q,W,A,S,Z,X to move all tile.

- Merge 2 tiles with same value to create larger value tile (2 + 2 > 4, 4 + 4 > 8, ...).

- Clear blocked tile (gray-color) by move a tile with same value over it.

- When a 4096 tile is created, the player wins.

* FEATURES *

- Flat style, smooth animation.

- Undo up to 2 times.

- Leader board.

- Keep playing for High score after collected 4096 tile.

- New challenge with block tile.

* ANDROID VERSION *

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.rey.hexa4096

If you have any issues with the app, please contact me via: rey5137@gmail.com

Enjoy game!
